about_the_game:
Hustle Simulator allows you to create a small business empire within a country town. You have multiple businesses to rent or buy. There lots of activities to keep you entertains whilst you earn a passive income. Don't get to comfortable, your business will have its ups and downs.


With your small amount of money, where will you start? With the ranch where you can earn money from selling resources or breed champion animals for high profits. The motor trade where you can buy and sell cars? What about the pawn shop where you have to thrift your way to wealth? How you start your journey is up to you! Manage your stores for maximum profits by hiring workers to lightens the load on the manual tasks, hire managers that will take care of finances and stock. This does not instantly mean profit, You have to ensure your store is running smoothly and is still capturing the public's attention. Blink and you could be loosing money.


Expand your small business empire from running a motel, pawnshop, car trader, ranch, landlord, transport hub, multiple retail locations or even try your hand at the stock market. There is plenty of main opportunity and lots of small activity's to earn and spend your money.


Build your stores your way with shop customization and expansion options: Start from a humble little operation, increase your experience and spend money upgrading your buildings.

Want to show off your wealth to the town and highway travelers? Buy a prime spot of land and build your mansion, skyscraper, Tiny hut or whatever you choose. Using familiar building mechanics you'll be able to jump straight in.

Key Features:-
  • Multiple different business to start and manage
  • Hire employees
  • Economy, stocks, crypto and random events
  • Simple yet complex
  • Small story line (2+ Hours)
  • Main game completion(10+ Hours)

name: Hustle Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4690 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 760 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6600K / AMD Ryzen 7 1700X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1070 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Start your rags to riches story with little money to build up a small business empire in a quaint country town. Buy and sell cars, property, animals, stocks, crypto, much more variety. Construct your dream mansion to flaunt your wealth, however, getting there will be hard work.
